JOB DESCRIPTION:
Job Description : 
 The successful candidate is expected to contribute to all parts of the software development and deployment lifecycle,   including design, development, documentation, testing and operations. 
-They must possess strong verbal and written communication skills, be self-driven and deliver high quality results in a   fast paced environment. 
 Key Skills:   
We're looking for people who are smart and can make things happen.  
-Solid experience in C# or VC  . 
-Solid expertise in Data Structures and Algorithms. 
-Solid understanding of Object Oriented design and concepts. 
-Great understanding of database theory and solid experience in at least one relational DBMS. 
-Outstanding interpersonal and communication skills. 
-Obsession with quality and customer experience - Attention to detail coupled with ability to think abstractly.  
-Experience with scaling and performance of large systems
